item.description:
This movie starts at 4:30.

I think its time for a comedy. After a couple of war movies and my newly posted French thriller, I think we should lighten up a bit and so here is Mike White's (screenwriter for "School of Rock"- hey, it made me laugh!) directorial debut, that is at times hilarious, poignant and heartbreaking.

Peggy (Molly Shannon) is a happy-go-lucky secretary and dog lover, a great friend, employee, and sister who lives alone with Pencil, her beloved beagle. But when Pencil unexpectedly dies, the enduringly optimistic Peggy embarks on a journey of personal transformation. After adopting every dog at the local pound and several dating disasters, she seems to be searching for love in all the wrong places.

Here is a complete review: http://www.variety.co...

Tom will be holding a meetup sign near the front row after the movie and then we will go off to discuss at a local restaurant.
item.name: The Year of the Dog -An Offbeat Comedy
